content: this legal text summarizes the division of assets between two parties referred to as mrs bgiu and mr bgia the assets include various properties located in different municipalities mrs bgiu receives a dwelling a garage and agricultural land in castelfidardo an apartment in numana and an apartment with land in offagna mr bgia receives a dwelling and agricultural land in recanati a share in a company called va srl and a sum of money the value of each share is specified the document confirms that both parties have agreed to this division of assets
